titles.title: Because He Lives (easy familiar hymn of the Ch

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Because He lives I can face tomorrow Because He lives All fear is gone Because I know He holds the future And life is worth the living Just because He lives{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God sent His Son They called Him Jesus He came to love heal and forgive He bled and died To buy my pardon An empty grave Is there to prove My Savior lives{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How sweet to hold A newborn baby And feel the pride And joy he gives But greater still The calm assurance This child can face Uncertain days Because Christ lives{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And then one day I'll cross that river I'll fight life's final War with pain And then as death Gives way to vict'ry I'll see the lights of glory And I'll know He lives{/lang-eng}
